articles.title: 32 Things That Will Make Your Home Feel Like A 5-Star Hotel With A Motel Budget
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: This article lists various products such as a new duvet cover, hotel bedsheets, rainfall showerhead, waffle robe, fuzzy slippers, spa slippers, and more to enhance the hotel-like experience at home, are available for purchase on Amazon. Also, Authentic Style & Co. sells spa slippers on Etsy and Drive 'Til Dawn sells custom keychains on Etsy.

articles.title: Two Edmonton software groups develop apps to help Canadians buy local
articles.author: Zac Delaney
articles.summary: William Boytinck and Matthew Suddaby co-developed "Shop Canadian," an app to help consumers identify Canadian products. Similarly, Punchcard Systems CEO Sam Jenkins' business partner, Estyn Edwards, conceived "Check the Label" after discovering the origin of mustard production, aiming to inform consumers about product origins.

articles.title: Two Edmonton software groups develop apps to help Canadians buy local
articles.author: Zac Delaney
articles.summary: Shop Canadian, an app created by William Boytinck and Matthew Suddaby, launched on February 5, 2025, allowing users to scan barcodes and rate products based on their Canadian origin. Punchcard Systems launched Check the Label on February 10; this app uses UPC scans and AI to provide manufacturing information to consumers, helping them identify Canadian products.

articles.title: 2026 Kia Seltos spied: Hybrid SUV to take on Corolla Cross, Kona
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: Kia is expected to debut the new Seltos model in January 2026. The vehicle is currently undergoing winter testing in Europe.

articles.title: Our February beauty edit featuring Prada, L'Occitane, and more
articles.author: Nbsp
articles.summary: Prada launched Paradoxe Virtual Flower Eau de Parfum, which uses AI to reimagine jasmine. Dolce & Gabbana introduced Blueberry Nutri-Tint, a skin tint providing 24-hour hydration. 111SKIN released Black Diamond Cream, an anti-ageing treatment targeting wrinkles. L'Occitane launched Immortelle Harmonie collection for mature skin.

articles.title: ‘Hope it comes soon': New plans for Terry's Country Store in Mayport
articles.author: Alexus Cleavenger
articles.summary: Creative Cook Mayport is planning to open a boutique grocery store, butcher shop, and a chef's table dining experience in the Mayport area this summer. The store will offer a range of products, including locally made spices, jams, oils, vinegars, produce, seafood, and meats.

articles.title: Amazon Alexa Update Delayed Because It Won't Stop Giving Wrong Answers
articles.summary: Amazon is delaying the launch of its newly improved Alexa, initially planned for a hardware event. Alexa was caught giving incorrect answers during testing. Despite the delay, Amazon is still planning a February 26 event.

articles.title: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal announces company's first AI product, Nugget; says will give it for free to these founders
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal has launched Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform capable of autonomously handling up to 80% of customer queries. This no-code platform, developed over three years within Zomato Labs, features real-time learning, automated quality audits, and voice AI agents, integrating with tools like Freshdesk and Zoho. Zomato is offering Nugget free to businesses under contract with other providers until their existing terms expire.

articles.title: This K-Beauty Blurring Powder Gives Me Filtered Skin With Just One Swipe
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: Laneige has launched a new no-spill blurring powder that mattifies skin. This finely-milled formula absorbs excess oil, blurs imperfections, and smooths skin texture without feeling heavy or smudging makeup. The powder is available for purchase and has received positive reviews from users.

articles.title: QN Sets Up in Morocco, Eyes Local Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Aymen Alami
articles.summary: QN has launched its operations in Casablanca, Morocco, offering luxury watches, homecare solutions, and high-end personal care products. The company's product range includes water filtration and air purification systems, luxury Swiss watches, and a new high-tech showerhead will be launched soon.

articles.title: 'Open for appointments' - Una Healy launches new 'DOOP by Lidl'
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a new 'DOOP by Lidl' beauty salon and a line of luxury-inspired beauty and skincare products. The product launch will occur in stores from March 20.  A pop-up salon will be open in Dublin City Centre on March 7 and 8, offering treatments and showcasing Lidl's skincare ranges such as Ár Ocean and Marbella Glow.

articles.title: David and Goliath: Does Big Tech's grip on the emerging XR market exclude start-ups from success?
articles.author: Chandraveer Mathur
articles.summary: Mustard Glasses is launching smart glasses featuring an AI assistant, speakers, cameras, and microphones, all paired with a customizable app ecosystem. The glasses are powered by a dual-core ARM processor and a Bluetooth SoC, with the companion app built on Flutter. The brand plans to add an augmented reality display this year.

articles.title: Best smart dishwashers in the UK to transform your kitchen
articles.author: Abha Shah
articles.summary: Miele has introduced the G7191 Integrated Dishwasher, featuring app connectivity for remote control of wash cycles and status monitoring. Its AutoOpen feature aids in drying dishes. The dishwasher has an LED screen for manual control, different washing programs and is known for its quiet operation.

articles.title: If Staying At Home Is Your Favorite Hobby, Check Out These 30 Wayfair Products
articles.author: Becca Glasser-Baker
articles.summary: Ninja releases the Creami, an ice cream maker with seven modes for various frozen desserts. Wayfair offers a variety of products including colorful area rugs, corner bookcases and accent chairs. Nespresso offers machine with milk frother, so your perfect flat white is one button away.

articles.title: Vax carpet cleaner for pet owners is now under £100 on Amazon
articles.summary: Vax offers the Dual Power Plus carpet cleaner with dual rotating brushbars and a pre-treatment wand. Shark's CarpetXpert Deep Carpet Cleaner EX150UK is available with a discount and features a handheld stain remover. The Tower Aquajetplus Upright Carpet Cleaner is also on sale and has tough bristles for pet hair removal.

articles.title: 36 Inexpensive Beauty Products That Work Just as Well as Pricey Ones
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: Cosmopolitan editors recommend a variety of budget-friendly beauty products, including makeup, skincare, haircare (featuring brands like Pantene, John Frieda, and Tresemme), and bodycare items, all priced at $10 or less. These products are presented as effective, affordable alternatives to luxury brands.

articles.title: Why spray dry nozzles are important for high-quality dairy powders
articles.author: CBN
org: IND Food, Dairy Processing & Manufacturing News
articles.summary: Spraying Systems Co., represented by Monitor Engineering in South Africa, offers SprayDry® nozzles for the dairy industry. These nozzles are designed for applications such as milk powder and infant formula production, enhancing product quality, operational efficiency, and cost savings. The SB Series SprayDry® nozzles are suitable for viscous dairy products and feature clog-resistance, energy efficiency, and food-compliant versions.

articles.title: These are the hottest AI models, what they do, and how to use them
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI launched o3-mini, optimized for STEM tasks and available with a subscription for heavy users, and Deep Research for in-depth research via ChatGPT Pro. Mistral introduced app versions of Le Chat, a multimodal AI assistant, while Google released Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental excelling at coding with a Google One AI Premium subscription.

articles.title: Myntra fwd HAULidays Fest offers perfumes and body sprays at up to 60% off; Long lasting picks for you
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Aqualogica launched Refresh+ Sun Kissed Vanilla Perfume Body Mist, blending vanilla and tropical florals. Plum introduced BodyLovin' Vanilla Vibes Eau De Parfum with vanilla, caramel, and woody notes. Renee launched Women Bloom Eau De Parfum, a floral fragrance with citrus and musk. Secret Temptation introduced Romance Perfume, a floral and fruity scent. DressBerry launched You Had Me At Mimosa Eau de Parfum, inspired by a mimosa cocktail. BEARDO launched Men Godfather Eau De Parfum, with spicy tobacco and woody accords. PERFUME LOUNGE launched Designer Club Men Set, featuring four unique scents. Envy introduced Men Set of 2 Natural Body Spray, with citrus and woody notes. Villain launched OUD Men Eau De Parfum, with oud, spicy, smoky, and leathery notes. Ramsons introduced La Opale Eau De Parfum, a fusion of floral, citrus, and musky notes.

articles.title: botsailor Create a WhatsApp Chatbot For Free In 5 minutes with BotSailor
articles.author: Globe Pr Wire
articles.summary: BotSailor launched a no-code platform in 2025 for building WhatsApp chatbots for businesses. It offers features like AI-powered conversations, drag-and-drop flow builder, multi-channel support (WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, Telegram & Website chatbot), and seamless integration with other platforms. The platform helps businesses automate customer engagement and provides analytics to improve chatbot performance.

articles.title: Skyrocket Marketers Launches as a Fintech SEO Agency in Cyprus, Offering Comprehensive Digital Marketing Solutions
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Skyrocket Marketers, a new digital marketing and web agency, has launched in Cyprus, specializing in data-driven online growth strategies, especially for the fintech sector. The agency provides a range of services, including digital marketing campaigns, SEO solutions, affiliate marketing programs, and web development, emphasizing adaptability, transparency, and measurable outcomes.

articles.title: MTN unveils Go M.A.D in Enugu
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: MTN unveiled its Go Make A Difference (Go M.A.D.) Enugu edition at Villa Toscana Sports Bar. The event focused on encouraging acts of kindness to create a positive impact.

articles.title: Amazon £55 portable clothes dryer is 'impressive' and uses less energy than a tumble dryer
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Portable Electric Clothes Dryer with a 1000W fan and 15kg capacity, promoting it as a cost-effective and portable solution for drying clothes. Buyers have highlighted its efficiency, while some criticisms focus on its flimsiness and size limitations. Dunelm provides an alternative heated indoor clothes dryer.

articles.title: The Microsoft Copilot money grab
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced Copilot, an AI-powered feature, into its Word program, integrating it as a tool to assist users with writing. The company has also adjusted its Microsoft 365 subscription pricing, where users can avoid the increased cost by disabling the Copilot service which also turns off advanced security and cloud storage.

articles.title: China's agricultural products gain popularity in overseas markets
org: Guizhou Gui Tea Group Co., Ltd
articles.summary: Yang's team in Xinyang has developed and sells loofah products internationally, expanding from a small team to a company with over 80 employees and establishing a factory for processing. Guizhou Gui Tea Group Co., Ltd. is exporting Guizhou matcha to over 40 countries and regions, with plans to build matcha food processing facilities to further extend the industry chain.

articles.title: Get a chance to win a box of drip coffee!
articles.author: Zhu Yile
org: Shanghai Pudong New Area Special School
articles.summary: Flavor Ranger is offering a box of their drip coffee (Swift Edition) as a prize to five lucky winners. This suggests an ongoing promotion or introduction campaign for the product.

articles.title: Popular fried chicken shop launches new location
articles.author: Jack McLaughlin
articles.summary: OX-B's restaurant chain has opened a new location in Newark at 917 N 21st St. This brick-and-mortar space replaces their original shipping container eatery, which will remain open until the grand opening. The concept offers wings, chicken sandwiches, wraps, salads, and specialty items like waffle fries topped while chili or boneless wings.

articles.title: This $25 Hair Treatment From a Hailey Bieber-Loved Brand Revived my Dry, Flaky Scalp
articles.author: Madi Koetting
articles.summary: A new scalp cleanser is introduced to address dry and flaky scalps. Users apply a quarter-sized amount once a week in place of shampoo. The cleanser aims to exfoliate and nourish the scalp, resulting in less flaky, dry, and more invigorated hair.

articles.title: Here's What Teen Guys Actually Think About Bath & Body Works' New Luxury Cologne Collection (& the Designer Scents They're Duping)
articles.author: Jacquelyn Greenfield
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works launched a new men's fragrance collection featuring five scents priced between $20 to $60. These fragrances, including 'My Signature,' 'Eau So Navy,' 'Glory,' 'Hues of Blue,' and 'Rouge Rebel,' are body sprays and are offered as more affordable alternatives to high-end colognes like Bleu de CHANEL and Creed Aventus. Testers found that the new collection has fragrances that smell similar to other expensive colognes on the market.

articles.title: Rinse: Interview With Co-Founder & CEO Ajay Prakash About The Clothing Care Company
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Rinse provides a direct-to-consumer laundry and dry cleaning service through a mobile app, website, and SMS. The company offers Wash & Fold, Dry Cleaning, and clothing donation pickup. Rinse focuses on eco-friendly practices and aims to provide convenient and high-quality service.

articles.title: HONOR to Unveil New Strategic Initiative HONOR ALPHA PLAN at MWC 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: HONOR will unveil its new strategic initiative, the "HONOR ALPHA PLAN", at Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025 and showcase its latest AI innovations. The HONOR ALPHA PLAN embodies values as the company's new strategic direction. HONOR is committed to fostering an open and collaborative environment where innovation thrives through partnership.

articles.title: Zomato launches Nugget, in-house AI enabled customer support platform
articles.author: Riya R Alex
articles.summary: Zomato launched Nugget, an AI-native, no-code customer support platform designed to autonomously resolve nearly 80% of queries. Built over three years by Zomato Labs, Nugget supports over 15 million interactions monthly across Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure, and is now being offered to other businesses globally.

articles.title: 6 must-try Pixel features you probably haven't heard of
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Google Pixel 9 launched a new feature called "Add Me" that helps users include everyone in group photos by combining two photos into one, which involves one photo without the photographer and another with the photographer posed next to the group. Additionally, the Pixel 9 supports the addition of a 48-megapixel ultrawide lens to its rear camera array alongside Google Gemini and AI features.

articles.title: Deepinder Goyal Introduces ‘Nugget'—Zomato's AI-Driven Customer Support Game Changer
articles.author: Priyadarshini Singh
articles.summary: Zomato is launching Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform designed to automate customer service. This platform has already managed 15 million customer interactions per month for Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure and is now available globally. 90% of companies trying Nugget have signed up for it.

articles.title: Shoppers 'never had so many compliments' after using ghd hot brush - £107 off
articles.author: What's On Writer
articles.summary: ghd's Duet Blowdry Hair Dryer Brush is available at a reduced price of £271.91 on Amazon. BaByliss offers the Hydro-Fusion Anti-Frizz 4 in 1 Hair Dryer Brush for £80 at Boots. Revlon's One-Step Hair Dryer and Volumiser is priced at £25 at Argos.

articles.title: Intel announces launch of 'AI for Entrepreneurship' micro-learning module for Indian innovators
articles.author: DC Correspondent
articles.summary: Intel and the Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship launched the 'AI for Entrepreneurship' micro-learning module to skill 1 lakh young innovators in India. The National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) is also involved in this initiative, aimed at demystifying AI and fostering entrepreneurial thinking.

articles.title: HMRC issues new update for taxpayers who owe government money
articles.author: Samantha Leathers Money
articles.summary: Ninja's new Ninja Swirl by CREAMi Ice Cream and Soft Serve Maker, launched on February 11th, is now available on Amazon for $350, including a CreamiFit program for health-conscious consumers. Amazon Prime members can benefit from free one-day shipping. Other discounted Ninja products are also highlighted.

articles.title: Maker's Mark Debuts New Bourbon Whiskey Ad Campaign
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Maker's Mark launched a new campaign, 'Perfectly Unreasonable,' which premiered during NBC's 'Saturday Night Live' 50th Anniversary Special. This campaign represents a new product introduction or marketing initiative by the company.

articles.title: Life Care opens the first Experience Shop in Romania
articles.author: Simona Hrincescu
articles.summary: Life Care has launched its first 'Life Care Experience Shop' in Bucharest, featuring a blend of technology and personalized customer interaction. This shop introduces the 'Life Care AI Assistant', offering tailored recommendations and an interactive shopping atmosphere. The company plans to expand with more locations in Bucharest, providing customers with expert advice and a comprehensive range of Life Care products.

articles.title: Maker's Mark Debuts New Bourbon Whiskey Ad Campaign
articles.author: John Kell
articles.summary: Maker's Mark is launching a new advertising campaign called 'Perfectly Unreasonable' in 2025, featuring TV, streaming, and digital/social media ads. The campaign aims to highlight the brand's focus on quality and connect with consumers on a deeper level, despite a recent softening in the American whiskey market. Suntory Global Spirits, Maker's Mark's parent company, reports that demand for their core American whiskey brands, including Maker's, is outpacing the market.

articles.title: Hyperlink InfoSystem Launches Design Limitless: A Game-Changer in Unlimited Design Subscription Services
articles.author: Hyperlink Infosystem
articles.summary: Hyperlink InfoSystem launched Design Limitless, a platform providing custom design subscription packages. This service targets enterprises, startups, and SMEs, offering flexible outsourcing and economic pricing. Design Limitless aims to remove the challenges of in-house design teams and uncertain project costs.

articles.title: Zomato launches AI platform 'Nugget' for enterprises
articles.summary: Zomato has launched Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform for enterprises. The platform requires no code and is designed to allow businesses to scale support effortlessly with customizable, low-cost features. Nugget offers seamless automation without rigid workflows.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer shoppers rush to buy 'cosiest ever' spring bedding with 'beautiful' look
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer shoppers are buying a "cosiest ever" bedding set featuring 'StayNew' technology. Dunelm released a gingham bedding set in new colors as part of their spring collection, priced between £30 and £50.

articles.title: What Is Nugget? Zomato Launches New AI-Powered Customer Support Platform For Global Businesses
articles.author: Zubair Amin
articles.summary: Zomato has launched Nugget, an AI-powered, no-code customer support platform designed to automate customer queries. Nugget, developed by Zomato Labs, is already processing 15 million interactions monthly across Zomato, Blinkit, and Hyperpure. Zomato is also offering Nugget for free to founders stuck in contracts with legacy providers.

articles.title: Vax carpet cleaner for pet owners has been reduced by 42% on Amazon
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Vax Dual Power Pet Advance Carpet Cleaner at a discounted price of £99, reduced from £169.99. The cleaner, equipped with features like a pre-treatment wand and dual rotating brush bars, has received positive feedback, with over 2,000 units sold in the past month. Customers highlight its cleaning ability, compact size, and effectiveness on pet-related stains.

articles.title: Skill Ministry, Intel Partner to Launch 'AI for Entrepreneurship' Module for Young Innovators
articles.author: PTI
org: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
articles.summary: The Ministry of Skill Development & Entrepreneurship and Intel launched the 'AI for Entrepreneurship' micro-learning module, targeting 1 lakh young innovators across India. The module aims to demystify artificial intelligence and foster entrepreneurial thinking.

articles.title: 'No coding required': Zomato's AI agent makes customer support easy
articles.summary: Nugget, a voice AI agent, integrates data sources and SOPs to provide accurate responses and replicate human conversation. Zomato is offering Nugget free of charge to businesses under contract with legacy providers as part of its launch offer. Nugget can classify and analyze images for businesses like Zomato, taking necessary actions for returns and order support.

articles.title: MiPhi launches Storm 1100X external SSD for creators and gamers in India
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: MiPhi, a joint venture between Micromax and Phison, launched its first consumer product, the Storm 1100X external SSD, in India. The Storm 1100X SSD features read speeds of 1100 MB/s and write speeds of 1000 MB/s, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, and 2-meter drop protection. The 1TB variant is priced at ₹12,999 and is available on Amazon, with a 2TB variant launching soon.

articles.title: Win $10,000 and 1 Year of Laundry Service as Poplin's Chief Freedom Officer
articles.summary: Poplin is launching a campaign to select a 'Chief Freedom Officer' who will receive $10,000 and a year of free laundry service in exchange for documenting their experience and promoting Poplin on social media. Applications are open until March 31, 2025, and the chosen officer will represent Poplin at events and in media interviews, highlighting the ease of their laundry service.

articles.title: Win $10,000 and 1 Year of Laundry Service as Poplin's Chief Freedom Officer
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Poplin, an affordable laundry service, is offering a contest prize of $10,000 and a year of free laundry service to one ambassador. This promotion aims to allow the winner to pursue their dreams by eliminating the burden of laundry in 2025.

articles.title: 6 Best Sunscreens Women Need To Pack For Their Vacation
articles.author: Karen Alfonso
articles.summary: Akind introduced a new sunscreen stick that is easy to reapply and convenient for on-the-go use. The sunscreen offers hydration and a non-sticky formula with a 5-layer barrier protection against pollution and UV rays and 12 hour moisture lock to help improve hydration.

articles.title: Meta keeps trying to invent the future. It hasn't worked yet
articles.author: Lisa Eadicicco
articles.summary: Meta is developing humanoid robots with the aim of creating a robotics platform for other companies. This initiative is part of Meta's broader strategy to diversify beyond social media, after previously launching products such as the Meta Portal and Ray-Ban smart glasses. The company aims to establish 'Meta' as more than just a social media app.

articles.title: 'Supermarket alternative to Gucci perfume saved me £128 – it smells so similar'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Aldi has launched Lacura Meadow Bouquet Eau de Parfum, a budget-friendly alternative to Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine, priced at £6.99. The perfume is described as having similar initial scent to the Gucci perfume, containing notes of Italian Mandarin, Bergamot, Jasmine, Magnolia, and Sandalwood and is available in Aldi stores nationwide while stocks last. There are also two other Gucci dupes to choose from - Lacura Blush Bouquet Eau de Parfum and Lacura Spring Bouquet Eau de Parfum.

articles.title: Zomato launches AI-backed customer support platform Nugget
articles.summary: Zomato launched Nugget, an internal tool developed over three years that supports over 15 million interactions monthly. Nugget is the first product from Zomato Labs.

articles.title: What makes a good phone? Khalil Ramos shares list
articles.author: Kathleen A. Llemit
articles.summary: RedMi launched the Note 14 Pro phone with AI features at SM Mall of Asia. The phone is targeted towards content creators, providing tools for shooting and editing content directly on the device. The RedMi Note 14 Pro aims to provide a feature-packed experience that is worth the price.

articles.title: SMOOV Chapman brand upholds quality, introduces new label
articles.author: Daniel Obi
articles.summary: The La Casera Company PLC has unveiled a refreshed look for its SMOOV Chapman brand, introduced to the Nigerian market in 2014. The new label features vibrant imagery and aims to appeal to a broad audience while maintaining the same original taste and quality.

articles.title: Kerrygold launches category-first sweet spreadable butter range
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: Kerrygold has introduced a new product line, 'Sweet Spreadable Butter,' in the UK, marking a category first. The range includes Maple Syrup, Maple Syrup & Cinnamon, and Salted Caramel flavors, designed to enhance breakfast experiences. The products are scheduled to launch in Tesco stores across the UK starting in March.

articles.title: DeepSeek's RI may be the first of many AI super-apps to come
articles.author: Siddharth Pai
articles.summary: DeepSeek introduced its R1 model, a cost-effective AI model. This release prompted OpenAI to introduce o1 and o3 models and Google DeepMind to launch Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking. DeepSeek's R1 uses an automated system in which a computer assigns scores.

articles.title: Sex sales: China's sex doll revolution with an AI-morous embrace
articles.author: Bob Scott
articles.summary: WMDoll is launching its new MetaBox series of AI-enhanced sex dolls featuring AI modules and LLMs for enhanced interactivity. These dolls offer up to eight distinct 'personalities' and can continue conversations, with models costing an additional US$100 to US$200 over existing models. The company plans to embrace DeepSeek's AI models and develop a wearable AI device for non-smart models.

articles.title: ZIWO unfolds pioneering AI solution in Saudi Arabia
articles.author: GCC Business News
articles.summary: ZIWO launched its new AI solution, 'ZIWO AI,' at LEAP 2025 in Riyadh. This SaaS product uses advanced Sentiment Analysis to determine customer emotions and guide agents towards optimal resolutions.

articles.title: Life Care Opens the First Experience Shop in Romania
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: Life Care launched its first Life Care Experience Shop in Sun Plaza Bucharest, introducing a new retail concept. The shop features a Life Care AI Assistant that offers personalized product recommendations and answers customer questions. The Life Care Experience Shop is organized into zones like Health, Care & Beauty, Cleaning, Weight Management & Balance, and Best Sellers, providing a new standard in health shopping.

articles.title: Nail Defender Says It Destroys Fungus Fast—But Is It Really That Powerful?
articles.summary: Nail Defender, a new product formulated with natural ingredients, has been introduced as a solution to combat nail fungus effectively. It aims to eliminate nail fungus, reduce discoloration, and promote natural nail growth. It is available exclusively on the official website in three packages priced at $69.99 for one bottle, $179.99 for three bottles, and $294.99 for six bottles.

articles.title: China's Tencent says trialling own AI reasoning model alongside DeepSeek
articles.summary: Tencent is trialing its AI reasoning model and has integrated DeepSeek into Yuanbao chatbot and WeChat, enhancing question-answering and writing capabilities. BYD will also integrate DeepSeek's software into its cars to provide the new feature.

articles.title: Vivo V50 price and storage option revealed during India launch- All details
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Vivo has launched the V50 smartphone in India, featuring a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage, and a 6.77-inch AMOLED 120Hz display. It has a dual 50MP rear camera setup and a 50MP front camera, along with AI-powered features and is backed by a 6000mAh battery with 90W fast charging. The Vivo V50 is available in three storage variants and colour options, with pre-booking started and official sale on February 25, 2025.

articles.title: 'Own your audience': new streamer's pitch to small filmmakers
articles.author: Daniel Thomas
articles.summary: YouTube is testing a new shopping feature. This feature allows users to shop directly on the platform. The test aims to explore new avenues for e-commerce integration within the video-sharing platform.

articles.title: Samsung tri-fold phone display size tipped ahead of launch- Know what to expect
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch its first tri-fold smartphone, the Galaxy G Fold, featuring a G-style foldable design with inward-folding displays. The smartphone may feature a 6.49-inch cover display and a 10-inch unfolded display. While the exact launch date is not yet confirmed, rumors suggest it could be in 2025 with sales beginning in early 2026 in selected regions.

articles.title: Turkmen business is invited to the international exhibition of non -food goods
articles.author: Aijahan Ataballieva
articles.summary: Mayer Expo Asia invites Turkmen entrepreneurs to showcase their non-food products at the NON-FOOD ASIA EXPO 2025. The exhibition, featuring segments from household chemicals to packaging materials, will take place in Tashkent in May 2024 and Almaty in November 2025, offering a platform for Turkmen companies to establish international business contacts.

articles.title: Luxembourgish start-up LETZ AI rubbing shoulders with the elite
articles.author: Tim Morizet
articles.summary: LETZ AI, a Luxembourgish start-up, launched V3 of its AI platform last summer, enabling the reproduction of highly detailed images. This attracted major brands like Walmart and Puma who are now using the platform. Puma even created a virtual influencer for an ad on Instagram.

articles.title: Younger Generations Reshaping Retail Marketing Strategies
articles.summary: Al Maya is participating in Gulfood to showcase its latest innovations and its commitment to quality, variety, and convenience. Al Maya will present a curated selection of products, including fresh produce and international delicacies, aimed at meeting diverse consumer needs. This participation aims to strengthen Al Maya's position as a trusted partner in the food industry.

articles.title: Golden Rookie marijuana store opens
articles.author: Sam Klomhaus
articles.summary: Golden Rookie, a new cannabis shop, had its soft opening this weekend at 605 Grand Ave. The owners aim to provide a unique shopping experience with clearly marked prices and products. The store's grand opening is tentatively scheduled for Saturday.

articles.title: Top 10 plays of the week featuring soccer and basketball dominance in Texoma
articles.author: M.J. Baird
articles.summary: Dyson Gen5outsize Absolute features strong suction power, a sleek design, and cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: College softball: Midwestern State vs St. Edward's and other MSU athletics news/notes
articles.author: M.J. Baird
articles.summary: Dyson's Gen5outsize Absolute features strong suction power, sleek design, and advanced technology, making it a worthwhile purchase.

articles.title: 35 Cleaning Products You'll Be A Little Smug Telling Friends About
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of new or updated cleaning products and home goods available for purchase, such as the Pink Stuff's "Sqeezy" sponge set, Puracy laundry stain remover, and a self-cleaning electric toilet brush. Other highlighted products include iRobot's Roomba Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo, and  Angry Orange pet odor eliminator that prevent you from replacing your carpets. These products offer solutions for cleaning, stain removal, organization, and odor elimination in homes and cars.

articles.title: Samsung tri fold phone aka Galaxy G Fold display sizes tipped
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy G Fold, a tri-fold smartphone featuring a 6.49-inch cover display and a 10-inch unfolded screen. The device, expected in January 2026, will use a G-style folding mechanism for improved durability and is likely to be priced as a high-end, experimental offering.

articles.title: TLCC Plc Excites ConsumersIn CarbonatedSoft Drink Market With New Label On SMOOV
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: The LaCasera Company PLC (TLCC) has unveiled a refreshed look for its SMOOV Chapman brand, reinforcing its commitment to innovation and consumer satisfaction. While the label has been updated, the company assures that the drink's taste remains the same.

articles.title: You can now buy a purse made out of an Nvidia H100 AI GPU for $65,536
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: GPU Purses has launched a new line of purses that incorporate components from a real Nvidia H100 GPU. The purse is priced at $65,536 and is described as containing a rare, one-of-a-kind GPT-4 training GPU.

articles.title: 47 Products That'll Give You A Magical Transformation For Stuff You Already Own
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of products intended to repair, refresh, or enhance existing items. Highlights include various cleaning solutions, repair kits for puffer jackets from Puffer Jacket Repair on Etsy, fabric dyes from Rit, and shoe care products from Solemates, as well as accessories such as couch cup holder. These products provide consumers with cost-effective and sustainable alternatives to purchasing new items.

articles.title: Vitafoods India 2025: Angel Yeast Brings Innovative Yeast Protein to Dining Table
articles.author: Pr Newswire
org: Protein Nutrition and Seasoning Technology Center
articles.summary: Angel Yeast showcased AngeoPro, a premium yeast protein, at a tradeshow, highlighting its high digestibility, amino acid profile, and sustainability. AngeoPro aims to provide an economical and environmentally-friendly alternative to whey protein, with plans to increase protein content to 85% and scale production at their Baiyang Yichang facility by 2025, boosting annual output to 11,000 tons.

articles.title: Docs: the NYT greenlights the use of select internal and external AI tools for editorial and product staff, including from OpenAI, Amazon, Google, and Microsoft (Max Tani/Semafor)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: The New York Times is permitting its product and editorial teams to use select internal and external AI tools. These AI tools are provided by companies including OpenAI, Amazon, Google, and Microsoft.

articles.title: Li Hongyi's GovTech Department Demos 45 Products
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Singapore's Open Government Products (OGP) is developing and launching open-source solutions for public service. Recent projects include 'Bridge,' a medical transport scheduling tool, 'Hawkernomics,' an educational game, and 'Spaceship,' an AI-powered prototyping tool, designed to improve public service delivery and empower government officers. OGP leverages agile methodologies and user-centric design to create these innovative products.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 review: Worthy challenger to Koreans, luxury EVs
articles.author: Sabyasachi Dasgupta
articles.summary: BYD is introducing the Sealion 7, an electric vehicle with characteristics similar to the Seal model. A key feature of the Sealion 7 is its battery, which provides a range of approximately 560 kms on a single charge.

articles.title: The Myths And Legends Of Apple's iPhone SE
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Apple is preparing to launch a new iPhone SE model. The article speculates on how the upcoming 2025 iPhone SE will compare to the original iPhone SE and its impact on the community.

articles.title: YSH Farm Unveils New Brand: Original Tiong Bahru
articles.author: Media Outreach Newswire
articles.summary: YSH Farm, a Singaporean farm, has launched a new brand called Original Tiong Bahru, which will focus on reviving traditional Singaporean recipes. The brand will offer specialty products such as Roasted Duck and Suckling Pig, available exclusively online.

articles.title: 15 Genius Products That Will Seriously Up Your Life
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: The article features the introduction and benefits of several products. The Pink Stuff is highlighted as an effective cleaning solution for various surfaces. O'Keeffe's lip repair is recommended for extremely chapped lips, and Humidi-Clean is noted for keeping humidifiers free of mold and bacteria.

articles.title: YSH Farm Unveils New Brand: Original Tiong Bahru
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: YSH Farm, a Singaporean duck farm, is launching a new brand called Original Tiong Bahru. This brand revives traditional recipes dating back to the 1930s, paying homage to Singapore's culinary heritage.

articles.title: Chevrolet Spark returns as a rebadged Baojun Yep
articles.summary: Chevrolet is launching the 2025 Chevrolet Spark EUV, a subcompact electric crossover based on the Baojun Yep. The Spark EUV features dual 10.25-inch screens, advanced driver assist systems, and potentially a 100hp electric motor with a 41.9kWh battery, offering a range of up to 401km.

articles.title: Dove Debuts First-Ever Comedic Ad During SNL50: The Anniversary Special to Celebrate Its Most MOISTurizing Body Wash Yet
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Dove launched its new Deep Moisture Body Wash, highlighting its moisturizing formula and Renewing MicroMoisture™ technology that provides 24-hour lotion-soft skin. The launch includes a comedic TV ad created by Maximum Effort, which debuted during SNL50: The Anniversary Special, to showcase the new MOISTurizing ad. This new formula goes beyond hydration, working with the skin's natural renewal process to deeply nourish and lock in moisture like never before.

articles.title: YSH Farm Unveils New Brand: Original Tiong Bahru
articles.author: YSH Farm
articles.summary: YSH Farm launched "Original Tiong Bahru," a new brand featuring heritage recipes and specialty dishes like Roasted Duck and Suckling Pig. A limited-time Goose Offering is available for Chinese New Year. The products are exclusively available online.

articles.title: Dove Debuts First-Ever Comedic Ad During SNL50: The Anniversary Special to Celebrate Its Most MOISTurizing Body Wash Yet
articles.author: Dove
articles.summary: Dove launched its most moisturizing body wash ever and celebrated the launch with its first comedic TV ad. The ad debuted on NBC during the SNL50: The Anniversary Special.

articles.title: AI And The New Age Of Advertising: A Revolution, Not a Takeover
articles.author: Guest Writer
articles.summary: AI tools like Salesforce Einstein, Adobe Sensei, Snap AR, and Meta Spark Studio are transforming advertising by personalizing customer experiences and creating interactive campaigns. AI-powered Brand Agents are streamlining workflows and improving brand experiences. Brands are experimenting with AI-powered real-time assistance, enhancing efficiency and accuracy.

articles.title: Baidu brings DeepSeek to its search engine, Ernie model
articles.author: Fan Feifei
articles.summary: Baidu will integrate DeepSeek's large language model into its search engine and Ernie model. The company plans to launch Ernie 4.5, which will be open-source by June. Baidu's Ernie Bot will be available for free starting April 1 with upgraded technology.

articles.title: Vivo V50 Launched: Check price, specs, features, colour, camera and battery details
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Vivo launched its latest Vivo V50 smartphone in India. Pre-orders for the new smartphone have already begun.

articles.title: After weeks of testing, I can confirm Jones Road's gel eyeliner is as good as ...
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: The MUA brand has updated its cult formula for its new brand, indicating an update to an existing product.

articles.title: Godrej Consumer's Ezee witnesses strong offtake, aims to grow household penetration
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Godrej Consumer's Ezee, a liquid detergent for winterwear, has experienced strong growth. The company intends to increase household adoption through multiple price points and expand the overall winter liquid laundry detergent market. Ezee, launched 25 years ago, aims to continue its double-digit growth by catering to specific consumer needs.

articles.title: Entrepreneur Makeover Expands Digital Community with Cutting-Edge AI Resources
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Entrepreneur Makeover, an online community, has integrated new artificial intelligence (AI) resources. This expansion aims to equip business owners with essential knowledge for the digital landscape. It reinforces the company's commitment to entrepreneurs.

articles.title: YSH Farm Unveils New Brand: Original Tiong Bahru
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: YSH Farm, a Singaporean duck farm, launched its new brand, Original Tiong Bahru. The brand introduction honors Singapore's culinary heritage. This launch targets the younger generation to experience traditional Singaporean flavors.

articles.title: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal announces company's first AI product, Nugget; says will give it for free to these founders
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal launched Nugget, an AI-powered customer support platform. This no-code platform, developed internally, autonomously handles up to 80% of customer queries. Nugget is now available to businesses worldwide, expanding Zomato's portfolio into B2B software services.

articles.title: Amazon has its all-new Ring Doorbell back on sale for its lowest price ever in ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on the Ring Doorbell at its lowest price ever.

articles.title: Tencent, Baidu Look to Capitalize on DeepSeek's Stunning Rise
articles.author: Liu Peilin
articles.summary: Tencent and Baidu are launching search functions powered by DeepSeek's large language models. Specifically, Tencent is incorporating DeepSeek-R1 model into Weixin (WeChat) to enhance its search capabilities, currently in beta testing.
